content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm happy to discuss the rental price of the apartment with you. What is your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 Euros. The apartment is 25 square meters. I'm dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Thank you for your time.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for sharing that information with me, Juan. Based on the size of the apartment and your budget, I would suggest a monthly rental price of 900 Euros. This price takes into account the fact that the apartment is relatively small and would be a good fit for someone who wants to save money. However, I'm open to discussing other terms and conditions that might be important to you, such as the length of the lease or any additional fees that might be required. What are your thoughts on these terms?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros. I would like to sign a one-year lease agreement. I don't want any additional fees. Thank you for your understanding.

TERMINATE
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your acceptance of the rental price and the one-year lease agreement. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and I'm looking forward to working with you as your landlord. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Have a great day, Juan!
name: Heinrich Heine
